page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF PAM, 8
page.content: ON A SATURDAY I GET UP AT 11 O CLOCK. I GO DOWN TO THE BATHROOM AND GET DRESSED .THEN I GO DOWNSTAIRS HALF A SLEEP AND HAVE CORNFLAKES WITH SUGAR AND MILK.I GO OUTSIDE AND START RIDING MY BIKE.I SEE MY UNCLE COMING UP THE DRIVE SO I GET OUT OF THE WAY.WHEN I HAVE BEEN AT AUNTIE AND UNCLE'S FOR A LITTLE WHILE ,I HELP SET THE DINNER TABLE.AFTER DINNER I CLEAN OUT THE CUPBOARDS FOR AUNTIE .IN THE AFTERNOON I HELP UNCLE CUT THE GRASS. THEN I GO INDOORS AND WATCH T.V. I GO OUT ON MY BIKE. THEN I GET THE TEA. AFTER TEA I GO HOME AGAIN.IN THE EVENING I WATCH T.V. AGAIN. THEN I GO OUT AND PLAY ON MY ROLLER SKATES. I GO UPSTAIRS AND HAVE A WASH. THEN I READ FOR A LITTLE WHILE.FINALLY I GO TO SLEEP.
